website_summaries.verdict: Whole-grain bar that includes five super grains. A good source of fiber that’s not too sweet and not too hard to chew.
pros: Relatively low sugar content compared to some other bars
Great for breakfast or a snack
cons: Some find the taste to be lacking
Can go stale after short storage time

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for those "probiotics"
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what's the matter with the "probiotics" but they cause intestinal distress/hyperactivity (if you know what I mean) in this consumer. Also the product itself tastes like hay, only drier and less interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Downey Broxon

customer_reviews.title: Stale product delivered
customer_reviews.text: Opted into the "subscribe" feature for this because I eat them fairly often for breakfast... Had too many that tasted off before I realized their "Best By" date was Feb 2019. This is printed both on the individually wrapped items and the box they were delivered in. What else was printed on the box? The delivery date of April 24 2019. They arrived 2 months past their best buy date. So pissed with Amazon over this.
customer_reviews.author: Bob John Randall

customer_reviews.title: Best Breakfast Bar Line and Flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to breakfast bar and flavor. I order these by the truckload. They taste great and they are sufficiently sweet but not disgustingly so. The texture is a unique and satisfying one, being somewhat crunchy and somewhat chewy. Finally, the new lowered pricing on this cannot be beat. KIND bars are pricey so it's nice to be able to buy them at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Ilan Dor

customer_reviews.title: pretty stale
customer_reviews.text: I've been eating and loving their peanut butter snack bars for a while, and I'm surprised at this downer. My teeth didn't snap through it and nothing crunched. They went in without drama and through it with a hohum. Notwithstanding the July 2019 useby date, these were beyond old. Thirty-two two-paks, huh? Will I give this product another try? I wouldn't give 2-pak #2 another try. They aren't any good they way they are so -- out they go.
customer_reviews.author: WhosKiddingWhom

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down 👎
customer_reviews.text: I like the bars but I have bought this pack twice from Amazon & they are not as fresh as one's I bought other places. Amazon will not do a return or exchange instead tells you to contact the manufacturer!
customer_reviews.author: DVS

customer_reviews.title: Not pleasing to the mouth in flavor or texture
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed with these. I love cranberry orange and expected these to have flavor and be at least a little bit moist. I find these to be dry and lacking in flavor. I taste no cranberry nor orange. They are dry and bite off in chunks that are not pleasing to the mouth in flavor or texture. I usually love Kind products but they missed the mark with these. Too bad I bought 8 boxes. I don't buy them again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie C.

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL !
customer_reviews.text: Dry like cardboard! No flavor! Couldn't eat them. Who are the being KIND to????
customer_reviews.author: Red in Ridgecrest

customer_reviews.title: So yummy!!  I am obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: They are not a hard granola bar and they are not a chewy cookie. They are somewhere in between. If you love the flavor of grains with some orange and cranberry hints, you will adore them. I love that I get a bite and chew on it until it is total mush to make it last longer and it makes my colon happy. Hint: DO NOT eat more than one package unless you really need to go! 32 bars for $16 is the best price I have seen yet. These are now a staple in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after trying them at my mothers. Thought a 32 count might be doing the Costco overboard thing. Turns out I ran out in 3 weeks! They're great for out the door breakfast or late afternoon snack. Not particularly fond of granola type snacks--usually to dry, sweet or overly nutty. You can definitely taste the blueberries but not overtly sweet. Moist but not chewy, fair amount of almonds without overwhelming everything else.
customer_reviews.author: D4k3

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as when you buy at a store
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why, but they seem different than what you get at the store. packaging is the same and all. they arent expired or anything like that. But the ones i get from amazon seem to have a different texture. not as chewy. almost like more of a grainier texture than im used. But its cheaper on amazon. And they arent "bad" just different. Maybe amazon doesnt store them correctly? like the warehouse is too hot or too cold? i dont know.
customer_reviews.author: chris iuliano

customer_reviews.title: Good but I want something tastier with cranberries
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but love the blueberry one more. Perhaps too much orange zest? Not sure. Don't get me wrong, it's good and I'll buy it again, but I just know it could be better. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Paige Turner

customer_reviews.title: Tasty flavor for finicky eaters
customer_reviews.text: These are tasty breakfast bars. They're somewhat hard, but chewy. They have plenty of grains you can see. The flavor is very good, and in fact I had to read the ingredients list of the Honey Oat variety to know that it includes raisins (not whole), because I knew I could taste *something* of that sort. And quite honestly, that makes the flavor more balanced and palatable, to me. I'm sometimes not wise about my eating habits and go without breakfast, and this is that right balance of flavor and satiation for my morning, and it's sweet without being too much so. If my stomach starts to rumble, these do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E

customer_reviews.title: Issues with listing
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product 10 times before. This breakfast bar is my family’s go-to product. However, recently I saw another listing for this Kind Bar breakfast bar where reviewers noted for $20+ they had only received ONE box of bars that consisted of four pouches with two bars in each. That helped me avoid that listing. THIS listing seemed right, I had used before to get eight boxes of 4 servings with two bars in each, EXCEPT, as seen in the photo, I only was shipped four boxes outside of their KIND box. Shorting my order by 50%! Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koo

customer_reviews.title: Date is good but the freshness is not
customer_reviews.text: Best by date is December 14, 2020, but they sure don’t taste fresh. The last box that I bought tasted a little off, but I ignored it and ate all of the bars. This box taste even more stale, definitely not the same fresh taste I was accustomed to when I was buying a bar or two at a time before the virus hit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Dry, no flavor
customer_reviews.text: This expired days after i got it. It came in bulk so, the first one was softer, the others like dry hard cardboard. :( The chocolate chips melted all over the individual wrappers and smeared my fingers when i opened it. Very crumbly but not moist like Enjoy Life's breakfast bars. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bates

customer_reviews.title: UGH! These have no blueberry or almond flavor.
customer_reviews.text: If I could have given them zero stars, i would. Given that there is NO flavor and has 8 grams of fat with only 3 grams or protein, I'm going back to the best Kind bars: Dark Cocoa Breakfast Bars. The dark cocoa is great for a mid-day snack, too, when I'm out and about and need some protein. As for the blueberry almond....to say these are a disappointment is an understatment.
customer_reviews.author: Remy Agee

customer_reviews.title: Great deal...
customer_reviews.text: These are a great deal I’ve purchased several cases. What I will say is I suspect these were not kept in a temperature controlled environment. Compared to the exact same bars/flavors as the grocery store these are all tougher to chew (not as fresh, is the best I can describe this) Also many of the bars (2 per pack) are stuck together, again leads me to believe they were frozen thawed over heated in a warehouse or on shipping trucks. No issue with any of the expiration dates are all reasonable. Have and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: These are a great deal I’ve purchased several cases. What I will say is I suspect these were not kept in a temperature controlled environment. Compared to the exact same bars/flavors as the grocery store these are all tougher to chew (not as fresh, is the best I can describe this) Also many of the bars (2 per pack) are stuck together, again leads me to believe they were frozen thawed over heated in a warehouse or on shipping trucks. No issue with any of the expiration dates are all reasonable. Have and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Dried out and hard.
customer_reviews.text: I contacted the Kind company and they were surprised and are going to follow up and told me to contact Amazon. Here is part of what they said. "Based on your description, we believe that these bars may have been subject to adverse storage or weather conditions. This could affect the quality, thus affecting the taste and texture of the product." The product supplied can not be eaten and it as a good by date of Feb 2021. . For now I would not buy this item at all until the product on had is taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Cook

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t need the chocolate!
customer_reviews.text: I do like these, but they are a little dry and crumbly. I prefer some of the other Kind Breakfast bars that are softer and chewier. And they would be better without chocolate. I don’t understand the need to try to enhance something with chocolate. Anything less than really good chocolate doesn’t help. I also prefer my chocolate by itself. Probably won’t get this flavor again, they have better choices.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snack bars, tad chewy
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't yet seen these Kind Breakfast Bars but had tried the Kind Oats and Honey Healthy Grains Granola Bars, so I thought to give these a try. They were just as delicious in flavor, and they had a nice softer chewy texture. Great for snacks! I also purchased the peanut butter flavor as well. Both great deals on Amazon to purchase in large quantities. After snacking on them for a few weeks, I felt these were a little too chewy - I didn't care for all the chewy crisps - and if these were just slightly softer like a chewy cookie without crisps, they would be even better.
customer_reviews.author: LGraham

customer_reviews.title: This is a repeat purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I like these breakfast protein bars - they taste good and are good for us. I use them when I don't feel like cooking a breakfast. I grab a banana and one of these KIND breakfast protein bars and it fills me up. This is a repeat purchase. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously fruity kind bar!
customer_reviews.text: These KIND bars are divine! They do not taste nutty at all- rather, they taste like large granola chunks. The chunks of dried blueberries add a magnificent tangy, sweet flavor to every bite. I couldn't be happier eating these in the morning for a pre-run snack, or as an afternoon pick me up. My ONLY complaint is that the bars are quite small and are not quite enough of a meal for me, and therefore the value isn't as worth it as a thick protein bar.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Miller

customer_reviews.title: Kind of strange tasting - not nearly as good as the blueberry bars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is wrong with these but I won't buy again - the flavor is bland and rather odd. However, the bars are fresh and have five months before sell by date. The cranberry flavor could be much stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: CONSTIPATION???
customer_reviews.text: After years of struggling with chronic constipation I've found the answer. Recommended by my sister I couldn't find the probiotic Kind bar it in any store therefore I turned to Amazon, unfortunately I had to buy a case. I wake up each morning and eat a pack (2 bars) with my morning coffee along with one Zenwise Health Digestive Plus Prebiotic & Probiotic Supplement pill (found on Amazon), practice this approach, give it a few days to kick in and kiss your constipation goodby. Age, medication and diet are no longer an excuse or factor, hope it works for you as it has for me. Regularity helps with sleep, weight, energy and overall well being, good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: not that good
customer_reviews.text: I am TRYING to eat better, and I'm willing to spend a bit more to do so. I like blueberries, so thought I would try these. Flavor is so-so, a bit bland; but the texture is what really hurts this product. It's dense, and just seems like it wants to be crunchy, hints at it, but it's actually tough and chewy. It seems that Kind brand products are a healthy choice compared to the granola and other breakfast bars I normally buy. But I can't overcome the lack of flavor and the texture of these. I won't be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K

customer_reviews.title: Ordered and paid for 32 bars, got 28. One box missing
customer_reviews.text: It's not one box containing 32 bars. I got 7 boxes each containing 4 bars. That's 28 not 32 bars. I am missing one box of 4. I also don't see a tab to request a reimbursement or receive the missing package.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: They are nutritious.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a case of 32 Kind breakfast bars. I wanted a breakfast bar I could grab for on the go. I don't eat breakfast so I wanted something nutritious. The Kind bar was nutritious, that's about the only thing about it I liked. Little flavor, kind of hard. I would not order them again. I would try other bars. I am going to try the Kashi bars.
customer_reviews.author: MaryMerc

customer_reviews.title: This could be 50% sawdust and I wouldn't know the difference
customer_reviews.text: I have to say these aren't going to win any awards for flavor. For all I know these bars used to be a shelving unit from Ikea, but I feel full after I eat them and the satiated feeling lasts a long time. There is a hint of banana flavor and an occasional bit of chocolate to help the palate distinguish this as food. They seem healthy at least.
customer_reviews.author: My Eyes Are Up Here!

customer_reviews.title: Old and hard like a rock
customer_reviews.text: Very old I bought four different flavors and all were hard like candy and old. I have been buying them from the store and never seen this. It rips your gums and mouth to try to chew them.
customer_reviews.author: AHA

customer_reviews.title: Product is out of date
customer_reviews.text: Product was expired when it arrived. Contacted amazon who sent a replacement that was expired. Did this two more times, all three shipments were expired. Its a good product but I'm done buying food on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A. Deikun

customer_reviews.title: Great on the go gluten free breakfast.
customer_reviews.text: We have trouble keeping enough of this in stock in our house. They are a great on the go gluten free breakfast or snack for me. I usually keep a couple in the car if I get unexpectedly hungry or delayed. My daughter is a scout and loves them for hiking or camping. This is our favorite flavor although there are a few others we like as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Page

customer_reviews.title: Good taste but too much hassle.
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste, but it crumbles too much. And when you eat on the go, these crumbs with chocolate soil your clothes and everything around. Probably I will switch to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anatoly K

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly AMAZON ships half a case? BEWARE!! -5 stars for the bars!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, have been buying from Amazon for years, I get my order today, and the case box has had 4 boxes removed??? WTH? got a credit but what a hassle. Will not buy from Amazon again. Still advertised as : "Contains 32 - 1.76oz Orange Cranberry KIND Breakfast Probiotic bars" False.
customer_reviews.author: reg noms

customer_reviews.title: Stale product!
customer_reviews.text: Product was packed nicely, but the breakfast bars were literally hard as rocks and tasted stale. Turns out the “best by” date was Sept 2019.. stamped on the individual packages. Almost seven months ago! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Merrylu

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I bought so many
customer_reviews.text: These were horrible. Taste like cardboard. I have to confess I passed these out for Halloween because I just couldn't see throwing away boxes of these things. I did partner it with great candy so hopefully the trick or treater's weren't too mad at me
customer_reviews.author: Franshell Dumes

customer_reviews.title: breakfast bars do not age like fine wine
customer_reviews.text: I got two cases to stock up. One of the cases reaches its best by date just over a month from when I got the package. That's a LOT of dry, old breakfast bars to eat. Too bad there's no way to choose fresh as an option.
customer_reviews.author: drewnis

customer_reviews.title: Have you wondered what sawdust tastes like?
customer_reviews.text: These taste of sawdust. Just horrible. If I were starving I would force myself to eat them but would need lots of water to get them down my throat.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Great breakfast on the go or at the desk
customer_reviews.text: Not one who is able to eat breakfast immediately in the morning. So sometime after working an hour, I can handle a food item. Love the Kind Bar breakfast bars and this one is my fav as I love blueberries and almonds. No issues with freshness or flavor. Recommend highly for breakfast or mid afternoon snack. Delish!
customer_reviews.author: SAM Sass

customer_reviews.title: Addicting!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about these after the first box. Then, I had another, and another, and now I look forward to these each breakfast. A hint of banana, a little peanut flavor, and the chocolate chips gives it an almost candy bar essence of enjoyment!
customer_reviews.author: Caped Crusader

customer_reviews.title: I have had these in stores and I liked the product
customer_reviews.text: These came to me tasting very stale and with an expiration date only 6 months out. I have had these in stores and I liked the product, thus why I purchased them, but these bars from Amazon taste awful.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with these bars! I’m breastfeeding and I’m always hungry and have to tend to my baby most of the day. These bars are so delicious and so convenient. This is my favorite kind (honey oat). They are soft and not overly sweet.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, pretty expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Great bars, very filling, but they have almost doubled in price since I started ordering them. They may need to be removed from auto subscribe. I’m not sure they are nutritional enough to warrant the price they are asking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazn Artist

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the flavor, like eating cardboard with one unsalted peanut on it. Texture is like a semisoft cookie, more flour based and less like a granola bar. definitely recommend getting a smaller portion to try first, in case your tastes are similarly displeased.
customer_reviews.author: Pancake

customer_reviews.title: Do You Like to Eat Wood?
customer_reviews.text: Too much fat, and has bland, unhappy taste. Well packaged, but you don't eat the package. I will not re-order this.
customer_reviews.author: GBA

customer_reviews.title: This batch is crunchy
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product repeatedly for the last two years because I really like them, but this batch is so hard they crunch. Package says good until early 2020 but am debating requesting a replacement. Who wants two months worth of very hard "soft" whole grain bars that are months from expiration?
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting bars, be careful on freshness
customer_reviews.text: Depending on seller, some of these packs were a little stale. Not terrible, but harder than others within the same box. They were not expired however.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good value, no taste
customer_reviews.text: Pro: healthy and a good value for the price. So many protein and snack bars out there have too much sugar, saturated fat, or contain some form of dairy (I can't do dairy). These nuggets won't lead you directly to a future of insulin shots or statins so chomp away. Con: they taste like cardboard. Like other reviews on here, they are stale right out of the box even though the Sell By date is April of next year. Dunk the little bars in your coffee and they become tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: palzie12

customer_reviews.title: Delicious And Healthy
customer_reviews.text: Mine were not stale so i bought another 32 pack from Amazon. They have lots of fiber and i am addicted to the flavor. Thank You I believe it is the best deal you can get on these too. They are quite expensive at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Pyewacket

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for me to grab every morning and I also use as a snack. they are good for me and I know exactly how many calories I am eating.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: Yuck! Bland flavor! Should have never changed these. No taste compared to the older ones.
customer_reviews.author: Karl & Kimberly Blake

customer_reviews.title: Stale texture, good flavor.
customer_reviews.text: These ended up being a consistency that is a lot like a traditionally "stale" granola bar. They aren't crunchy, nor are they chewy. Once you get past the lackluster texture, the flavor is fine, but I find myself reaching for any other choice available, despite buying several boxes at one time of this choice.
customer_reviews.author: P Family

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Love kind bars and so dose my son. More for my buck through Amazon. Great variety also.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Probiotic not worth the sub-par flavor
customer_reviews.text: I usually really enjoy Kind bars, however, these Orange Cranberry Probiotic bars have a very mild and slightly off-putting flavor. I wish i knew they were not going to live up the normal standard for Kind bars to which I have become accustomed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Z.

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU AMAZON! LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: Super addictive if you like peanut butter and oats. They are my everyday breakfast with coffee and sometimes a late night snack too. I am so glad Amazon sells them in bulk and they are FRESH!! A few times when I could find them locally, either a package or the entire box would be very dry and clearly stale.
customer_reviews.author: Merbear88

customer_reviews.title: Very bland taste
customer_reviews.text: Very bland. The breakfast ones are bland compared to the Kind chewy I used to be able to buy. Now they seem to be replaced with these. Not very good compared to the previous ones.
customer_reviews.author: Karl & Kimberly Blake

customer_reviews.title: Delicious healthy breakfast
customer_reviews.text: Delicious healthy breakfast... gluten free and wonderful flavor of orange peel and cranberries. Just enough sugar and not like eating dessert for breakfast. Just wish the oats were organic. Love these and the Kind blueberry bars.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad - not too sweet...
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty good. It's not that sweet so if you are expecting it to satiate your sweet tooth then you might want to choose something else. I think it's a good balance for a morning treat.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T. Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just received this order, and am trying to find someone to give them to! Never have I tried to chew an edible item that feels like cardboard glued together. The taste is okay, but the risk of breaking a tooth is too important.
customer_reviews.author: M. Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Great breakfast bars.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these breakfast bars. I have one many mornings if I don't have time for a fancy breakfast. I often eat one along with drinking a liquid yogurt when on the go - which seems to happen about 25 days out of 30 :-). A healthful quick breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great on-the-go meal!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very well and taste great. Freshness is good but that’s based off firmness. They’re not hard but a little firm and maybe that’s what they’re supposed to be like but either way the taste is great.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Bars Crumble
customer_reviews.text: These bars crumble. They are pretty good but they don't hold up well. I like the taste. It is good. They are not as good as most of the Kind bars that I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Smoaks

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying addition as a meal
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever had a home made bran muffin ? These are close. The packaging was interesting. I enjoy them with my coffee. They are satisfying and filling. As a KIND product I had thought lower carbs but they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavor
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think I would like these when my trainer recommended them. But they are very fresh and the blueberry flavor is nice. They come two to a package so you either need to eat two or figure out what to do with the remaining one. I feel like I am getting fiber also
customer_reviews.author: G. Michelsen

customer_reviews.title: Healthy doesn't taste very good
customer_reviews.text: Seem dry and not very appealing to the palate. Considering each "bar" is 100 calories you would think it would taste better. Glad I bought in bulk....not!
customer_reviews.author: R. Hiltz

customer_reviews.title: We have always liked this brand
customer_reviews.text: We have always liked this brand, but this product is such an instant favorite with all the family. It seems more like a meal, as should if it is to be a meal replacement. Thank you KIND!! It is very tasty and not as messy as a similar product in another brand we have tried. The two bars in the pack take a little longer to eat than a single bar. The longer it takes to eat, the longer we feel satisfied. It goes great with a carton of yogurt, and that combo is compliant with my eating plan. God bless all who are trying to improve health by good eating habits.
customer_reviews.author: Judith G. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: I wish the packaging was more KIND to the environment
customer_reviews.text: The numerous good flavors of KIND bars coupled with Subscribe and Save mean that we purchase a lot. I wish there was packaging that was designed for bulk purchases, as each box contains only four individually wrapped servings (serving = two bars). I'm sure this is for grocery-store pricing (so that individual boxes do not seem too expensive). But it seems like excess packaging for those of us who go thru a lot of KIND bars.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Rip-Off
customer_reviews.text: Heads-up: They count the double wrapped bars (which is the serving size) as two bars. So if you order a box of 8, you get 4 servings, not 8.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqkalope

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Healthy Breakfast Option
customer_reviews.text: This immediately became my breakfast of choice. High quality Ingredients that taste like homemade apple oatmeal cookies, but healthier. They hold me over until lunch, and sometimes dinner- I drink plenty of water after eating. I've also enjoyed them in place of dessert. They quickly eliminate cravings. On monthly AD, never want to be without.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Tasty nutritious bar and a great bulk price
customer_reviews.text: One of those perfect products for having at work to satisfy a smaller meal requirement. This and an apple or other piece of fruit is a nice combo. The price for 32 bars is quite reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: thamnosma

customer_reviews.title: Very good. No longer like chewing rocks.
customer_reviews.text: I usually eat fun sized candy bars for breakfast. Shame on me. The first day I tried these, I thought they were dry and sugarless. Now, I LOVE the soft chewy texture. So filling and just the right amount of sweetness.
customer_reviews.author: Saveyourmoney

customer_reviews.title: Check the expiration date!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement order, because the first order I was sent expired 7 days after they arrived. The is no way that I was going to eat 8 boxes of these in 7 days. This is September 2020, the replacement order I was sent expired in July 2020!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Expiriation date !!
customer_reviews.text: I am preparing in advance for an event that was planned for mid-April, and now with recent events, will "hopefully" will occur in October. I am happy to receive the bars. However, the bars sent EXPIRE IN JULY 2020! SO YES, I WILL BE SENDING THEM BACK! I need a longer shelf life than three months on almost any product I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Harden

customer_reviews.title: Yummy on the go breakfast
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars, but found the second delivery to not be as fresh as the first. Overall I really like them and feel like they are a healthy, quick breakfast or snack. They’re filling and quite yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: At least for me, these just are not that good. I like Kind products in general but these were too gritty and lacked flavor. Won't buy this particular type again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love em...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty tasty and pretty healthy, not so great looking but what does that matter? And the main thing for me is that they do not cause any kind of reaction or problem with my celiac disease : )))
customer_reviews.author: Ed S

customer_reviews.title: Its the snack u dont have to feel guilty eating its low in sugar and very yum , yum.
customer_reviews.text: Love my breakfast bars now i can snack without feeling guilty. Taste n freshness are great, packaging is perfect. Thank u . See u soon.
customer_reviews.author: Olive H.

customer_reviews.title: Where the Honey Oat at?
customer_reviews.text: overall this is a great product. But you have not had the Honey Oat in stock lately. Why only that one has not been available in months. In months!!
customer_reviews.author: WethePeople

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan!
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for the taste and made me hungrier throughout the morning. Sugar high with crashing low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I’m addicted to these bars. They are filling - have eaten them for lunch. Can’t sleep when I’m hungry so I have had one before bed. They are best with coffee. Can u guess why they got 5 stars from me?
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and nutritious. What I love is that these bars are covered unhealthy surgery crap like other protein bars in the market! Great for breakfast with hot cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: tasty and filling
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty and filling. I especially appreciate the probiotics, as I am currently taking antibiotics and trying to restore some balance in my gut.
customer_reviews.author: M. Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Would taste great if not stale
customer_reviews.text: I like these bars as a quick snack at work or a breakfast on the go. Unfortunately, the bars are stale despite having a 5 and a half month "best by" date on them. I bought some Orange Cranberry which were stale too. They are tolerable to eat, plus I hate wasting food so I'm trying to eat them before the taste even less fresh. I'm sad they didn't live up to my expectations as I planned on subscribing if they were better.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite KIND bars...
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars so much - eat them everyday! Just the perfect amount of sweetness and texture is a mix of crunchy and soft. Great blueberry flavor, always fresh and consistent. These bars are the best!
customer_reviews.author: dash

customer_reviews.title: KIND of not my favorite kind of KIND.
customer_reviews.text: So, I accidentally purchased a case instead of a box. My bad. As to the product, well, I ate one and gave the rest away as the texture was dense, pasty, and difficult to swallow. I do enjoy several products from this brand, but this particular concoction will not be found on that list.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew F

customer_reviews.title: Really great with a cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.text: I got a good deal on these. 32 packs of two for 16 bucks, not bad. I really enjoy them with a cup of coffee. I was expecting the longer style bars, these are shorter and fatter but I don't mind. They are soft and chewy just like the other style.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: A quick meal on the run
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars for a quick healthy meal on the run. Easy to carry when you’re running errands and want a decent meal instead of fast food. Each pack comes with 2 bars, so they keep hunger away for hours.
customer_reviews.author: AmominIllinois

customer_reviews.title: Flavors make the difference
customer_reviews.text: This just isn’t what I would normally eat. I’m more of a almond and coconut eater, but my very favorite is the Pumpkin seasoned bar. It’s the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I love Kind bars, they are not overly sweet nor are they pasty like some others. This has a nice texture and filling. Helpful to keep hunger and sweets at bay. HMMM, nutritious too. Great combo for healthy dieters.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and a Value!
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty and a really great value! Tastles like oats, honey and really fills me up. Eat them for breakfast every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Ontko

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, but dry
customer_reviews.text: These taste pretty good, but they're kind of dry. As long as you have a drink of water to go with it, you'll be good.
customer_reviews.author: oldfashionedgirl

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Delicious. Great.
customer_reviews.text: Great for travelling especially for a quick snack and meal replacement (depending on your portions). Great portion control size and great before and/or after workout snack. Gluten free, not too sweet nor salty and is both nut free and chocolate free. Great clean taste.
customer_reviews.author: Kristha Carlaw

customer_reviews.title: Expire Tomorrow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my box and found that my 32 breakfast bars expire tomorrow! I'm not sure I have time for 32 breakfasts between now and then. Ordered a week ago and it arrived 4 days ago. Don't ship food within a week of expiring. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Quick Meal on the way to work
customer_reviews.text: These bars are a granola like rectangular cookie that is filling, tasty and nutritious. Got hooked on these bar about 4 months ago and they have been my Go-to breakfast while driving to work
customer_reviews.author: Edward S. Matisoff

customer_reviews.title: Not low sugar or calorie
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and seems to be healthier than most snacks. But maybe too good to be true? Still has lots of sugar and fats so definitely not a low calorie or low sugar treat
customer_reviews.author: Mr Josh

customer_reviews.title: A little bit dry, but that's OK!
customer_reviews.text: I use these as a complete meal replacement. I plan to keep them in stock for emergency hurricane food, as well.
customer_reviews.author: R2Art

customer_reviews.title: I eat too many of these things
customer_reviews.text: They taste good and are convenient. Great as a "head out the door" breakfast and carry less guilt as a treat. I eat too many of these things. Did I mention they also taste good? Oh, but not so much with the almond version.
customer_reviews.author: FD

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I use them interchangeably for breakfast, afternoon snack or before bedtime snack. Taste great and do not increase my blood sugar noticeably.
customer_reviews.author: SierraBob

customer_reviews.title: Well blended flavors for a great taste.
customer_reviews.text: These are a delicious snack or quick breakfast! I like the mix of grains and the flavors are blended well so that nothing is singularly overpowering. I wish the sugar content was lower, and maybe from honey, but these make me feel like I’m not putting the worst thing in my body.
customer_reviews.author: Dru-Anne Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great on the go
customer_reviews.text: these are not as dry as i thought they would be and don't make a mess like nature valley bars do and great taste
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

product_meta.title: KIND Breakfast Bars, Peanut Butter, Gluten Free, 1.8oz, 32 Count
product_meta.description: Flavor:Peanut ButterSoft baked with a crispy outside, these bars are a perfect part of an on-the-go breakfast. Each two-bar pack has at least one full serving of whole grains.
feature_bullets: Start your day with 100% whole grains, including 5 super grains, coated in peanut butter and soft-baked for a perfect on-the-go breakfast.
Contains one full serving of whole grains, providing sustained energy to keep you going.
Gluten free, No Genetically Modified Ingredients, 0g Trans Fat, Kosher
Good source of fiber, low sodium, 100% whole grains

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
